release for Martin Luther King Day doesn't have much to do with civil rights, strictly speaking. It addresses the shooting of Rep. Gabrielle Giffords of Arizona and the rhetorical and budgetary attacks on public employees of recent months. ALBANY, NY( 01/14/2011)- The recent horrific events in Tuscon have saddened us all.
